OboeArchitectureRegMap
Functions
commit

Update the tag in architectural register map and return the old tag.

Variable
index

Architectural register index to look up in architectural register map.

commit_ptr

The commit tag to be stored

Returns

The old tag in the given index.

forward

Return the whole architectural register map for restoring future register map.  See OboeFutureRegMap.restore.

Returns

The whole architectural register map vector.
